title: Emergency text averted possible California power cuts
description: Residents received a text to shut down non-essential power after record temperatures in the state.

title: Brazil bans sales of iPhones without USB power adapters
description: Apple says it will appeal against Brazil's ban on the sale of iPhones that do not come with adapters.

title: Two Government departments reprimanded by UK data watchdog
description: The action has been taken for failure to respond to Freedom of Information requests on time.
